about.title: About
about.description: Olivier Racette posesses multiples years of experience in various facets of IT. After working as an IT technician for the city of Westmount, he completed a bachelors degree in Computer Science. For advanced electives, he chose to broaden his knowledge as much as he could, going for classes in topics such as 3D, networking, artificial intelligence and computer vision. He then followed up with a year as a consulting developer for CGI, where he improved his overall skills. He has the expertise to develop applications in many languages, while also being able to work on either front or back end without a hitch.

jobs.title: Consulting Developer
description: Worked in collaboration with clients to build web solutions.
Developed modern microservices using Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Docker.
Designed interactive web interfaces with Angular
Implemented real time data services with websockets.
Automated testing with Jest, Jasmine, JUnit.

jobs.title: Data Entry
description: Online part time work for a confidential project.
Great opportunity to work with a full time college schedule.

jobs.title: IT Technician
description: Built a project tracking tool on the organization’s intranet using HTML/CSS, JS, PHP and MariaDB. The tool allows an administrator to add projects and data such as budgets, start dates and deadlines, and visualizes the data in multiple types of graphs to aid in decision making.
Set up and maintained a CentOS web server.

jobs.title: IT Technician
description: Assisted in the second revamp of the organization’s web site by remodeling the front-end.
Coded multiple bash scripts to automate data fetching jobs.

jobs.title: IT Technician
description: Aided in the revision of the organization’s entire web site; handled data migration and front-end development.
Rewrote obsolete documentation for the department’s software and servers.
